Test Name: Coccidioides Antibody (Complement Fixation and Immunodiffusion), Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect the presence of Coccidioides antibodies in spinal fluid using Complement Fixation and Immunodiffusion assays.
Container: Sterile screw-cap container for CSF aliquot
Equipment: Complement Fixation test kit, Immunodiffusion test kit, incubator, calibrated pipettes, test tubes
